name: Space Ripper Plastiline
description:
Space Ripper Plastiline is a remake of original game made in plastiline style.

It’s a hardcore space shooter. There’s no saves, a little HP and many dangerous enemies… If you can survive for 5 minutes you are arcade God! You need to destroy the enemies and collect gears to upgrade your ship. Game balance changes periodically, which makes the game unpredictable and difficult to get a high score.

Features

  • more than 50 different waves of enemies and bosses
  • upgrades your ship: weapon, engine, wings, death ray, energy shields, repair drons
  • boosters: firerate, speed, kamikaze, time shift etc.
  • wicked bosses
  • great number of explosions, fires and lasers
